Contact Us Company Name :- Repairs Management \n\n If you have any query you can reach out to us on this email Id:-\n\n
Email id : repairsmanagements@gmail.com \n You can also follow us on these platforms:- \n
repairsmanagements@gmail.com This is, perhaps, the most common application of computer vision. Until now the detection of defects is carried out by trained people in selected batches, and total production control is usually not possible. With computer vision we can detect defects such as cracks in metals, paint defects, bad prints etc. in sizes smaller than 0.05mm. Much better than the human eye! These vision cameras need an algorithm that is the “intelligent brain” which is able to differentiate what is a defect and what is not. This algorithm is designed and trained specifically for each particular application through images with defect and without defect. Vision Mission To serve as a leader by encouraging innovation and forward-thinking so that my employees can create technology that will improve the lives of those in developing countries. Select Location Search I am a Worker I am a User Register/Login Back Welcome
if you choose "I am a worker" then you will have to provide your occupation and work details "so that the people who need your Service, can reach easly to you either by mobile number or other means like email" "id or address with the help of this Application." if you choose "I am a User" then you need not to provide any details and you can directly search the person by clicking on "select Location" button. when you click on Select Location button then drop down will open and you need to provide below details to search the person. "1. Occupation" "when you click on this drop-down then you will have to select one occupation based on your requirement." \n\n when you click on these below drop-downs then you will have to select State,Destrict and City where you need a Service. 2. States 3. Destrict 4. City \n\n After following steps stated above you will get all the details of workers who belongs to your area.
if you get number of Worker&s detail in your area then you can filter out Details using Search field by providing address( e.g Village name,area name or landmark) or Pincode related to your area.
if no workers are available in your area you will get popup message as "records are not available".
